citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 on
12-Dec-18.
No one answered door, waited in driveway for 30 minutes. Unable to reach by cell phone and unable to leave
message because voice mailbox was full.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 on
12-Dec-18.
No one answered door, waited in driveway for 30 minutes. Unable to reach by cell phone and unable to leave
message because voice mailbox was full.
